Command Line Options
Table of Contents

Command Line Options

Using the features of OOEU


Syntax: 

     exw eu.ex [-bcps] [-full_debug] [source_file]
     oexw [-bcps] [-full_debug] [source_file]
  • -b Bind to executable (you must be running from a translated and compiled executable)
  • -c Shrouds the code, and doesn't delete any symbols (useful for later disassembly with dis.ex or translation by msil.ex)
  • -full_debug Leaves lines (where 'with trace' is in effect) and variable names when shrouding
  • -p Preprocess files to be RDS Euphoria compatible
  • -s Shroud files
